subject: fluoride
text: The adenylate cyclase of this corticosteroid producing, transplanted, adrenal cancer of the rat was stimulated not only by adrenocorticotropic hormone and fluoride, but also by the beta-adrenergic agonist, isoproterenol.

subject: POMC
text: The adenylate cyclase of this corticosteroid producing, transplanted, adrenal cancer of the rat was stimulated not only by adrenocorticotropic hormone and fluoride, but also by the beta-adrenergic agonist, isoproterenol.
